attributes.action: Allow the BBC licence fee to rise to £180 per year over the next 6 years
attributes.additional_details: The BBC is one of the great institutions of British culture. It's future should be very carefully handled and modelled. It is imperative that a new financial model does not imperil the services that they currently provide.
attributes.background: We want to government to allow the licence to rise to £180 per year over the next 6 years, until the government has road tested a new funding model with the BBC. This cost amounts to 51p per day for every citizen which is extremely good value.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606445
